bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I like to fly around pretty flowers

bug.question: I am red with black spots. People say I bring good luck. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle

bug.question: I hop around in the grass and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 I have long legs for jumping

bug.question: I carry food back to my home in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I am very strong for my size

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then make a cozy sleeping bag before I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I am young

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ My home is made of silk
🪰 Flies get stuck in my web

bug.question: I can glow in the dark and fly around at night. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 I only come out when it is dark
✨ I am a type of beetle

bug.question: I am long and skinny and dig in the dirt. Sometimes birds eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I am good for the garden

bug.question: I am a master of disguise. I look like a leaf.

hints.text: 🍃 I look like a part of a tree

bug.question: I pretend to be a flower to trick insects, and then I eat them. What am I?

hints.text: 🙏 My front legs look like I am praying

ocean.question: I swim in the sea, and I'm often orange. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am a type of animal
🥕 I am the same color as this vegetable

ocean.question: I'm big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵️ Boats like to float on me

ocean.question: I live in a shell and crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I carry my house on my back
🏖️ You can find me at the beach

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze into small spaces

ocean.question: I'm a big mammal that lives in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I sing songs to each other
💦 I blow water out of a hole on my head

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and walk sideways on the beach. What am I?
I am a fish with a very flat body that lives on the bottom of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 👁️ Both of my eyes are on the same side
🎨 I can camouflage to blend in with the seafloor
🥞 My shape is similar to this breakfast food

ocean.question: I drift in the ocean, and I sting if you touch me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am wobbly like this frozen treat when it melts

ocean.question: I'm a very long, thin fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I slither but I'm not a reptile
💡 Some kinds can give off electricity
🌊 I live in the ocean, sometimes hiding in rocks

ocean.question: I am a very small sea creature that makes a home out of calcium carbonate, and I form coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I live in a colony of others of my kind
🌈 My homes create beautiful colors in the ocean
